query.stmt: select bm.id,bm.company title,spd.name dept_name,state,remarks,author_one,author_two, author_three,spu.name name,create_time from bi_manu bm left join sys_p_user spu on bm.job_num=spu.id left join sys_p_department spd on bm.dept_id=spd.id where job_num = [var(RU.CUR_USER.id)] <#if state??> and bm.state = [state] </#if> <#if company??> and bm.company [like(company)] </#if>
